title: Guy Walks into a Psychiatrist's Office...
description: After therapy, Tony Soprano feels depressed over the negative impact it could have on his children.

title: Do Not Resuscitate
description: Tony and Meadow clash over her life choices, while Uncle Junior and Tony spar over how to handle their business.

title: Toodle-Fucking-Oo
description: Tony is caught off guard by a surprise reunion with his estranged sister, Janice.

title: Commendatori
description: Tony and Paulie travel to Italy on a business trip that turns into a personal odyssey.

title: Big Girls Don't Cry
description: Christopher and Adriana take drastic measures when her fear of marriage threatens to send him back to his old ways.

title: The Happy Wanderer
description: Richie Aprile gets out after ten years in prison and starts reasserting his authority.

title: D-Girl
description: Chris becomes a made man, while Tony experiences another panic attack.

title: Full Leather Jacket
description: Richie tries to involve Tony in a questionable deal.

title: From Where to Eternity
description: Christopher has an out-of-body experience during an operation and he has no recollection of it later.

title: Bust Out
description: Tony and his family have to stay in hiding until Phil Leotardo is dealt with.

title: House Arrest
description: Tony's newfound happiness is threatened when Paulie and Christopher cause a rift between him and Pussy.

title: The Knight in White Satin Armor
description: Ralph's callous behavior finally steps over the line, while Chris gets deeper into his heroin addiction.

title: Funhouse
description: Tony starts having flashbacks about Pussy's betrayal, and Livia becomes increasingly paranoid.
